summary: A pretty elf follower. How original.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#93c47d][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/s8WE6dr.png[/img][/center][/color][/b]
Ferwen is now part of [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89989]Pandorable's Heroines[/url] with updated stats, a custom body and a few small fixes to her face.

Ferwen is standalone, meaning that she doesn't require any other mods. She starts at level 5 and will level with you up to level 80. She is highly skilled with a bow, doesn't trigger pressure plates and will heal herself when low on health. You will find her in the Kynesgrove inn, resting after a long day of hunting. She is using hide armor and a hunting bow. As always, I highly recommend the use of a follower framework such as [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/]AFT[/url] or [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12933/]EFF [/url]as well as [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/?]Relationship Dialogue Overhaul[/url] to get the most out of your followers.

[b][color=#93c47d]SPECIAL EDITION?[/color][/b][color=#93c47d] [/color]Get Miniel and her sister [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11177?]here[/url]! 

[color=#93c47d][size=4][b]DETAILS[/b][/size][/color]
[b]Name[/b]: Ferwen
[b]Race[/b]: wood elf (uses the nord race in-game)
[b]Location[/b]: Braidwood Inn, Kynesgrove
[b]Body type: [/b]UNP
[b]Weight:[/b] 25
[b]Voice:[/b] FemaleYoungEager
[b]Essential[/b]: yes
[b]Marriable[/b]: yes

[b][color=#93c47d][size=4]INSTALLATION
[/size][/color][/b]Install using a mod manager of your choice or manually extract the contents to your Data folder. No mods or DLCs are required.

[color=#93c47d][size=4][b]FAQ[/b][/size][/color]
[b]Q: Can you make a version with a different body/warpaint/hair etc?[/b]
A: No. If there is something you want to change, do it. If you don't know how, ask in the comment section and I'll help you out. We all like different things, I go with what I like.

[b]Q: Will you share the preset?[/b]
A: You can find my presets [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90802]here[/url].

[b]Q: What is she wearing in the pictures?[/b]
A: Mods used in screenshots: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68950/?]Ciri's Outfit[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71843/?]The Lily[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78397/?]Barbaric Boob Armor[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27064/?]KDCirclets Redone[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81073/?]Apachii Divine Elegance Store[/url]. Poses by [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/halos-poser-s1-6/]Halo[/url].

[b]Q: Why aren't the outfits included?[/b]
A: [url=https://pand0rable.tumblr.com/post/165866969698/why-dont-i-include-outfits-from-my-screenshots-in]Why I will never include outfits[/url].

[b]Q: Can I include your follower in a mod?[/b]
A: No. 

[color=#93c47d][size=4][b]VIDEOS[/b][/size][/color]

Thank you [b]gonzoskyrim[/b], [b]black flame gaming[/b], [b]massive master[/b] and [b]boxofbeer channel[/b] for featuring Ferwen!

[b][color=#93c47d][size=4]CREDITS[/size][/color][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by hello santa
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS hairdos renewal[/url] by kalilies, stealthic khaos & shocky
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] by hvergelmir
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes of Beauty[/url] by lograam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45641/?]Raven's Warpaints[/url] by raven
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] by expired

Big thanks to these amazing mod authors for their great work, and for letting me use their assets.

[color=#93c47d][size=4][b]PERMISSIONS[/b][/size][/color]
Don't claim my content as your own. [b]Do not re-upload my content anywhere[/b] - if I want them on another site, I will upload them there myself. Contact me if you have any questions.

If you like what I do, you're welcome to follow me on [url=https://pand0rable.tumblr.com/]tumblr [/url]or [url=https://pand0rable.tumblr.com/donate]buy me a coffee[/url]. Or just leave me a nice comment!
author: Pandorable
